title: @Riot: When we will get a new Lux skin?
body: Well, the title says it all. The last time a rioter talked about this was 2 years ago? What happened?

replies.body:
I've had this tab up, waiting for Star Guardian Lux to hit PBE, and then I totally forgot to reply here! 

Have you had a chance to check her out?! What do you think? :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WkfBjskz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-01T05:38:54.888+0000)
>
> I've had this tab up, waiting for Star Guardian Lux to hit PBE, and then I totally forgot to reply here! 
> 
> Have you had a chance to check her out?! What do you think? :3

looks really good. like the particles and general look of the skin. with her big flashy spells, she has some real potential for crazy particle effects. similar to what veigar, ziggs, xerath and zyra have been getting. finally one skin, that makes use of her potential.

i still hope she will get an arcade skin next year, or one of the summer skins.

I would love a new lux skin. I see so many cool ideas for skins for her like a cheerleader, or an arcade skin. The ult for the arcade could be rainbow and the cheerleader could have an R for Riot. I also saw a "void" skin for her but I kind of like the light skins better for her.

Lux is lacking in the skin department. I get she has a higher number of skins than most champions, but none are recent and none of them are up to par with the standards Riot has put in place now. Out of all the skins she has, only one of them has particle changes and a recall. She deserves 1350RP-quality skin!
Lux has a ton of skins. There are other champs that don't have much and need one, like Zac, Diana, and others.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WkfBjskz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-23T15:20:25.083+0000)
>
> Lux has a ton of skins. There are other champs that don't have much and need one, like Zac, Diana, and others.

Yeah I know, but they promised, you know? And the Lux-Community is of the opinion, that all the Lux-Skins are not what they are supposed to be. Dians Skins for example are awesome.
I dunno bout that. I personally like the Spell-thief skin.
